trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Ukiah
There were no other sightings in Ukiah on or around August 31st 1977
divs: Sighting DetailsI was returning home after dark with my then 5 year old son, I am told by my now grown son that i pulled over and told him to get out of the car and look up, we did and he remembers seeing a hugh circle of rotating lights above us, no sound just hovering. He said there was someone pulled over behind us. Then suddenly the craft shot up and was gone. The only thing I remember is pulling over. I cannot remember the craft or the people behind us. Years later I was hiking near a large lake (daytime) when I heard a sound above me, in my mind before looking up I pictured something as large or larger than a football field ( the sounds was just so powerful), needless to say I was frightened to actually look, but even so I did and to my amazement there was nothing there physically, but the sound was there and i could hear it slowly move off to my right over the lake then it was gone.
